channel.title: html on Roomy
channel.description: Recent content in html on Roomy

item.title: Drag and drop API
item.description: Draggable HTML5의 모든 요소에는 draggable이라는 속성을 붙일 수 있다. <p draggable="true">drag01</p> <h3 draggable="true">drag02</h3> <div draggable="true">drag03</div> ... 이 속성이 적용된 요소를 이용해 드래그 이벤트를 활용할 수 있고 DragEvent, DataTransfer 와

item.title: Shadow DOM vs Virtual DOM
item.description: DOM, Die Or March ? :P DOM(Document Object Model), is literally a structured model by objects. In other words, DOM represents the web-page (documents) by object-oriented. Web browsers handle the DOM, and we can interact with it using Javascript and CSS. BUT, when we manipulate the DOM, it takes long bcuz of the rendering calculation (reflow and repaint). DOM은 말 그대로 오브젝트
